info.title: OData Service for namespace ODataDemo
info.description:
This OData service is located at http://localhost/service-root/

## Entity Data Model
![ER Diagram](http://yuml.me/diagram/class/[Product],[Product]-0..1>[Category],[Product]-0..1>[Supplier],[Category],[Category]-*>[Product],[Supplier],[Supplier]-*>[Product],[Country])

## References
- [Org.OData.Core.V1](https://github.com/oasis-tcs/odata-vocabularies/blob/master/vocabularies/Org.OData.Core.V1.md)
- [Org.OData.Measures.V1](https://github.com/oasis-tcs/odata-vocabularies/blob/master/vocabularies/Org.OData.Measures.V1.md)

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [OData Paging - Top](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.0/odata-v4.0-part1-protocol.html#_Toc445374630)

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: Skip the first n items, see [OData Paging - Skip](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.0/odata-v4.0-part1-protocol.html#_Toc445374631)

filter.name: $filter
filter.description: Filter items by property values, see [OData Filtering](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.0/odata-v4.0-part1-protocol.html#_Toc445374625)

search.name: $search
search.description: Search items by search phrases, see [OData Searching](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.0/odata-v4.0-part1-protocol.html#_Toc445374633)
